mapper.select:
select ta.id as id ,ta.acti_name as actiName ,ta.acti_address as actiAddress ,ta.acti_start_time as actiStartTime ,ta.acti_end_time as actiEndTime ,ta.apply_num as applyNum ,ta.acti_like as actiLike ,ta.acti_number as actiNumber ,ta.acti_poster_url as actiPosterUrl ,ta.show_apply_num as showApplyNum ,group_concat(ifnull(tc.avatar,tp.avatar))as avatar from tb_activity ta left join tb_activity_detail td on td.activity_id = ta.id left join tb_activity_apply ty on ty.activity_id = ta.id left join tb_user_person tp on tp.account = ty.account left join tb_user_company tc on tc.account = ty.account where 1=1 and ta.state != -1
and ta.acti_type = #{typeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and ta.acti_name LIKE concat(concat('%',#{keyWord}),'%') or ta.acti_address LIKE concat(concat('%',#{keyWord}),'%') or td.acti_detail LIKE concat(concat('%',#{keyWord}),'%')
group by ta.id
